name: Justin Thoreson
description: Hey! I'm Justin. I studied Computer Science at Seattle University, where I graduated with both a Bachelor's and a Master's degree. Currently, I am working as an Associate Network Engineer, SDET for Nintendo Technology Development as a contractor through TEKsystems. I'm interested in exploring networks, graphics, and other systems-level and low-level topics within tech. My hobbies include long walks, working out, moviegoing, and coding. :)
